column4: I'm looking for an alternative to grub that will be easy to config with PCBSD & Feisty -- any recommendations??
I'm looking for an alternative to grub that will be easy to config with PCBSD & Feisty -- any recommendations???
GRUB is good, you gotta read the doc. install grub-doc and type "info grub" (you'll need to know how to use info. i think that "info info" will get you started)
